name: L4DRL[7drl]
description:
This is my first 7drl entry.

Hitches are due to simulating projectiles (which I pause the game for.), and also a relatively inefficient dijkstra map setup... It's bad when there's lots of zombies and lots of shooting unfortunately.

It's a roguelite inspired in the vein of Left 4 Dead, and tries to follow the game as best as it can...

Arrow Keys - Move

F - firing a weapon if it's equipped

U - Use item from inventory (corresponding to letters)

G - Pickup item

Period to wait a turn.

It's not very polished, but it is playable start to finish... So by that vein it's technically a complete game.
